description: Clarity table to extract information about intervention templates.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier  for the intervention record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TASK_TEMPLATES_ID
columns.description: Task template ID for the intervention record.

columns.name: TASK_TEMPLATES_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the task template record.

columns.name: LPI_LTI_ID
columns.description: The source intervention template id of the patient intervention record.

columns.name: LPI_LTI_ID_INTERVENTION_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the intervention name.

columns.name: LPI_LTI_DAT
columns.description: Source intervention template DAT for the patient intervention record.

columns.name: INVTMPL_MERGE_DAT
columns.description: Contact where the template is created/merged.

columns.name: DUP_ACT_APPLIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Duplicate action used to create/merge the template.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Create a new record


Merge records


Ask users
